parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A steering system leak or failure can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: visible signs of rust or corrosion.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering gear box can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: Steering gear box sheared off the frame
visible signs of rust or corrosion

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: Upper bearing in the steering column failed

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Check Valve Failure Causing Water Hose Deterioration
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The excessive heat from the failed check valve can cause the water hose to deteriorate, leading to a leak and potentially a fire, which can result in damage to the vehicle and pose a risk to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: excessive heat from the check valve

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Serpentine Belt Failure with Diesel Engine
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the serpentine belt can cause a chain of events, including overheating, engine damage, and loss of power steering and brakes, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: unusual noises or vibrations from the engine.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Cracking of the tire sidewall can lead to a loss of tire pressure, causing a blowout or loss of control, which can result in accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Visible cracks on the tire sidewall

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The formation of bulges on the tire can lead to a sudden loss of tire pressure, causing a blowout or loss of control, which can result in accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Visible bulges on the tire sidewall

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front Brake Caliper and Rotor Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front brake calipers and rotors can cause a loss of braking power, leading to increased stopping distances, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Grinding noise when brakes are applied
brake pedal travels further than usual
vehicle pulls to one side when braking

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) can cause a loss of vehicle control, especially on slippery or uneven road surfaces, leading to accidents and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: ABS warning light illuminates on the dashboard
grinding or clicking noise when brakes are applied
vehicle takes longer to stop than usual
wheels lock up during hard braking.
